short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Scamadviser, check for scams, phishing and fakes
short.de: Scamadviser, Überprüfung auf Betrug, Phishing und Fälschungen
short.es,es_419: Scamadviser, revisar si hay estafas, phishing y falsificaciones
short.fr: Scamadviser, recherche des arnaques, des hameçons et des faux.
short.it: Scamadviser, controlla truffe, phishing e fake
short.ja: Scamadviser、詐欺、フィッシング、偽物のチェック
short.nl: Scamadviser, controleer op oplichting, phishing en nepproducten
short.pl: Scamadviser, program sprawdzający oszustwa, phishing i podrobione strony internetowe
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Scamadviser, verifica se há fraudes, phishing e falsificações
short.ro: Scamadviser, verificați dacă există escrocherii, phishing și falsuri
short.ru: Scamadviser, проверка на мошенничество, фишинг и фейковые программы
short.tr: Scamadviser, dolandırıcılık, kimlik avı ve sahteciliği kontrol edin
short.uk: Scamadviser, перевірте на наявність шахрайських схем, фішингу та підробок
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: Scamadviser，检查诈骗、网络钓鱼和假货

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScamAdviser.com helps over 3 million consumers every month to discover if a website is legitimate or a possible scam. You can now install the ScamAdviser browser extension to real time check if a website is legit or may contain malware, is phishing for your personal information or be an online fraud.
